paper.title: Measurements of flavor dependent fragmentation functions in Z0 --> q anti-q events
paper.comment: CERN-LEP. Measurement of the fragmentation functions for charged particles produced in E+ E- collisions at the Z0 resonance, separately for bottom(B), charm(C) and light(UDS) quark event samples, as well as for all flavours together. The results are based on data taken between 1990 and 1995 and use reconstructed D*+- mesons and secondary vertices to identify the different samples.
paper.author: ACKERSTAFF

dataset.comment: Mean multiplicites of 'uds', 'c' and 'b' quaRK events and the inclusive multiplicity
